[Home](./index.md) &gt; [ngx-tansu](./ngx-tansu.md) &gt; [Store](./ngx-tansu.store.md)

## Store class

Base class that can be extended to easily create a custom [Readable](./ngx-tansu.readable.md) store.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Store<T> implements Readable<T> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [Readable](./ngx-tansu.readable.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```typescript
class CounterStore extends Store {
   constructor() {
     super(1); // initial value
   }

   reset() {
     this.set(0);
   }

   increment() {
     this.update(value => value + 1);
   }
}

const store = new CounterStore(1);

// logs 1 (initial value) upon subscription
const unsubscribe = store.subscribe((value) => {
   console.log(value);
});
store.increment(); // logs 2
store.reset(); // logs 0

unsubscribe(); // stops notifications and corresponding logging

```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_value)](./ngx-tansu.store._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Store</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ngOnDestroy()](./ngx-tansu.store.ngondestroy.md) |  |  |
|  [onUse()](./ngx-tansu.store.onuse.md) |  | Function called when the number of subscribers changes from 0 to 1 (but not called when the number of subscribers changes from 1 to 2, ...). If a function is returned, it will be called when the number of subscribers changes from 1 to 0. |
|  [set(value)](./ngx-tansu.store.set.md) |  | Replaces store's state with the provided value. Equivalent of [Writable.set()](./ngx-tansu.writable.set.md)<!-- -->, but internal to the store. |
|  [subscribe(subscriber)](./ngx-tansu.store.subscribe.md) |  | Default Implementation of the [SubscribableStore.subscribe()](./ngx-tansu.subscribablestore.subscribe.md)<!-- -->, not meant to be overridden. |
|  [update(updater)](./ngx-tansu.store.update.md) |  | Updates store's state by using an [Updater](./ngx-tansu.updater.md) function. Equivalent of [Writable.update()](./ngx-tansu.writable.update.md)<!-- -->, but internal to the store. |
